project.name: Hackers Pursuit/Nerd Pursuit
project.description: A realtime game using https://github.com/Nerds/NerdPursuit/ questions.
project.what_we_did: Together with 9elements we invited a new game concept and a open source game implementation with node.js. Push your questions on github and improve your hacker DNA. https://github.com/Nerds/NerdPursuit/
